name: Abderrahmane Ait Hammou
bio: Passionate about user experience and vision-driven development, ensures the platform meets real traveler needs by aligning features with project goals. Always balancing priorities and feedback, Abderrahmane guides the team in delivering value each sprint.

name: Asmaa Bakki
bio: Asmaa keeps the team on track by facilitating smooth sprints, daily stand-ups, and solving blockers. They promote collaboration, clear communication, and an agile mindset within the group.

name: Ayman Said ElMassaoudi
bio: With a focus on continuous improvement, Ayman helps the team stay focused and flexible. They lead sprint planning and retrospectives, ensuring that team members remain engaged and productive.
